title: (x) Font ID on elegant serif italic (would love to know full face too) - a Baskerville {Florian}
author: gilesdickerson

comments.content: Any ID's or recommendations for a similar feel? Thank you in advance...

Hi Giles,

it is _some_ [Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20141117105949/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/baskerville/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D37%26w%3D600%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DLandscaping%2520%2526%2520Facilities%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D29). Hard to tell which one, at that angle/size.  
F
Thank you, I'll do some digging...
